channel.title: Software Governance on Theo van Stratum, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Software Governance on Theo van Stratum, PhD

item.title: Technical Debt Is Not a Metaphor
item.description: The case for treating deferred quality decisions with the same fiduciary seriousness as any other form of organisational liability.

item.title: What Is Probabilistic Delivery?
item.description: Why dashboards lie, story points fail, and actuarial science is the only honest alternative to the comfortable fiction of sprint velocity.
